title: myGov portal launched
description: myGov was launched in May 2013 as a single entry portal for multiple federal services.

title: TDIF concept and accreditation framework established
description: Trusted Digital Identity Framework (TDIF) introduced as voluntary accreditation framework for digital identity providers.

title: Australia Post Digital iD soft launch (available for download)
description: Australia Post released Digital iD via a soft launch and made it available for download (initial early adopter release).

title: NSW Digital Driver Licence trial expands
description: NSW expanded pilots and prepared rollout of the Digital Driver Licence prior to official launch.

title: myGovID app released
description: myGovID (now myID) Digital ID app initial release on 3 October 2019

title: NSW Digital Driver Licence launched
description: NSW officially launched digital driver’s licence in early Nov 2019

title: TDIF referenced as published framework (Jan 2020)
description: TDIF described as a set of rules and standards for safe use of online government services.

title: Digital ID Act 2024 received Royal Assent
description: Digital ID Bill became Act No.25 (2024) with Royal Assent on 30 May 2024

title: myGovID renamed myID
description: Australian Government Digital ID app myGovID renamed to myID from mid-Nov 2024

title: Digital ID legislation changes commence
description: Digital ID legislation changes from 30 Nov 2024 enabling expansion to states/territories and accreditation

title: Québec clicSÉQUR released online
description: Québec government authentication service clicSÉQUR was released online in 2005 for citizen access to services.

title: SecureKey Concierge in full operation
description: SecureKey Concierge credential broker service implemented in spring 2012 as part of Cyber Authentication Renewal.

title: GCKey became operational
description: GCKey authentication service became operational starting in September 2012

title: Sign-In Partner introduced (bank-based sign-in)
description: Canada introduced Sign-In Partner as an alternative to GCKey for government sign-in via participating banks

title: SecureKey Concierge launch announced
description: SecureKey announced launch of SecureKey Concierge for Government of Canada with initial bank sign-in partners.

title: BC Services Card replaced CareCard
description: BC Services Card replaced the CareCard in 2013 as provincial ID for services.

title: SecureKey Concierge passes 1M credential milestone
description: SecureKey Concierge surpassed one million credentials and processed more than one million transactions per month.

title: MyAlberta Digital ID program implemented
description: Government of Alberta implemented MyAlberta Digital ID program in July 2015 as a mechanism for digital identity credentials.

title: MyAlberta Verify identity proofing introduced
description: Alberta introduced verified account identity proofing by cross-referencing Motor Vehicle System data.

title: Verified.Me digital identity network goes live
description: Verified.Me became available for consumers of major Canadian banks as a digital identity and attribute-sharing network.

title: First federal digital ID pilot with Alberta launched
description: Treasury Board Secretariat noted the first federal digital ID pilot launched in summer 2019 in Alberta (MyAlberta Digital ID).

title: BC Services Card used to access CRA My Account
description: Second federal digital ID project launched Feb 2020 enabling BC Services Card to access CRA My Account.

title: Pan-Canadian Trust Framework draft updated with national standard
description: TBS digital ID background doc revised to add national standard on Aug 8, 2020 and referenced pan-Canadian approach.

title: Ontario publishes Digital ID technology and standards
description: Ontario publicly launched technology and standards for its digital identity ecosystem on 8 Sep 2021.

title: Interac announces acquisition of SecureKey digital ID services
description: Interac announced transaction to acquire exclusive rights to SecureKey digital ID services in Canada (incl. Verified.Me).

title: German national ID card introduced (new format)
description: German National Identity Card introduced on 1 Nov 2010 with chip and eID capability

title: AusweisApp2 released
description: Federal government provided new eID client software AusweisApp2 from 1 Nov 2014 with a trial phase.

title: AusweisApp2 source code released under EUPL
description: AusweisApp2 source code released as open source under EUPL, available on GitHub since 3 July 2017.

title: Online Access Act (OZG) entered into force
description: Online Access Act entered into force on 18 Aug 2017, obligating digital access via portal network

title: BundID provided (year of initial availability)
description: BMI provided BundID in 2019 as a central user account for digital government services (year-level date used).

title: eID-Karte-Gesetz entered into force
description: Act on eID card for EU/EEA citizens (eIDKG) entered into force on 1 Nov 2019.

title: eID card for EU/EEA citizens introduced
description: Germany introduced eID card for EU/EEA citizens on 1 Jan 2021 to enable online identification.

title: Fingerprints required on new ID cards
description: Two fingerprints are stored on identity cards issued from 2 Aug 2021

title: eID card issuance abroad enabled
description: German missions abroad designated by Federal Foreign Office can issue eID cards abroad since 1 Nov 2021.

title: AusweisApp2 renamed to AusweisApp
description: Federal eID client removed “2” from name and refreshed design from 6 Nov 2023.

title: NemLog-in established
description: NemLog-in was originally established in 2008 as common login for public self-service solutions.

title: NemID launched
description: NemID was launched on 1 July 2010 for citizens and businesses

title: Digital Post mandatory for businesses
description: Digital Post became obligatory for businesses on 1 Nov 2013 under Danish digital post legislation.

title: Digital Post mandatory for residents
description: Digital Post became obligatory for residents on 1 Nov 2014, shifting communications to digital mailbox.

title: NemID key app enables mobile login across public/private
description: NemID nøgleapp enabled mobile approvals and could be used where NemID keycard was used.

title: NemID nøgleapp released
description: Digitaliseringsstyrelsen and Finans Danmark launched NemID key app in spring 2018 (end of May).

title: MitID and NemLog-in law adopted
description: Danish parliament adopted the MitID and NemLog-in law on 27 April 2021

title: MitID legal provisions entered into force
description: Provisions on MitID entered into force on 6 May 2021

title: MitID launched
description: MitID launched in October 2021 replacing NemID for public and private services

title: NemID shut down
description: NemID closed on 31 October 2023 after transition to MitID

title: Digital Signatures Act entered into force
description: Digital Signatures Act (passed 8 Mar 2000) entered into force on 15 Dec 2000

title: X-Road launched
description: Secure data exchange layer began nationwide use

title: First ID cards issued
description: Estonian eID card first issued in 2002, forming a foundation for e-services

title: First digital signature given
description: First legally valid digital signature was given in Estonia in 2002

title: National ID-card introduced
description: ID-card enabled authentication and digital signatures

title: Internet voting first used in binding election
description: Estonia first used legally binding internet voting in municipal elections on 16 Oct 2005.

title: Mobile-ID service launched
description: Mobile-ID service launched by EMT, enabling eID authentication and signing via phone SIM

title: e-Residency launched
description: e-Residency program started

title: Smart-ID introduced
description: SK ID Solutions introduced Smart-ID to Baltic users in February 2017

title: ROCA vulnerability disclosed for ID cards
description: Estonia notified of ROCA chip vulnerability affecting ID cards issued since 2014.

title: FranceConnect launched
description: FranceConnect identity federation was inaugurated on 29 June 2016 to simplify access to online public services

title: Decret cadre NIR
description: Framework decree governing NIR usage

title: New national ID card format begins circulation
description: New credit-card-sized identity card began coming into circulation on 15 March 2021

title: Identité Numérique La Poste launched
description: La Poste began offering Identité Numérique service since 7 June 2021 for secure login and identity.

title: CNIe issued nationwide
description: From 2 August 2021, applicants receive the new-format electronic ID card across France

title: FranceConnect+ introduced
description: French government set up FranceConnect+ in 2021 for sensitive procedures requiring stronger authentication.

title: FranceConnect reaches 30M+ users
description: FranceConnect exceeded 30 million users five years after launch, accelerating adoption.

title: FranceConnect+ reaches 1 million users
description: FranceConnect+ reached one million users for sensitive online procedures.

title: France Identit? generalized
description: France Identit? opened to all and introduced digital driving license

title: FranceConnect+ integrates France Identité
description: FranceConnect+ integrated France Identité as a certified identity provider, expanding options beyond La Poste.

title: Identity Assurance beta with HMRC
description: GDS moved Identity Assurance project into beta with HMRC users in February 2014.

title: Verify public trials began
description: NAO reported public trials of Verify began in October 2014 with a small number of services.

title: GOV.UK Verify went live
description: GOV.UK Verify identity assurance system went live on 24 May 2016

title: NAO investigation into Verify published
description: National Audit Office published investigation noting Verify performance issues and funding plans.

title: Digital Identity and Attributes Trust Framework (beta) published
description: Government published beta version of UK digital identity and attributes trust framework on 13 June 2022

title: Final government service stopped using GOV.UK Verify
description: As planned, GOV.UK Verify closed; the final government service stopped using the platform on 30 March 2023.

title: GOV.UK One Login scaled to 1.5M verified users
description: UK press release noted GOV.UK One Login had over 1.5 million users who proved identity to access services.

title: GOV.UK One Login reaches 50 services (Oct 2024)
description: GDS reported 50 services using GOV.UK One Login as of October 2024.

title: GOV.UK One Login reaches 50 services
description: GDS reported that 50 services were using GOV.UK One Login as of Oct 2024

title: GDS blog announces One Login milestone
description: Government Digital Service published blog post celebrating 50 services milestone.

title: Digital Veteran Card launched in GOV.UK One Login app (wallet credential)
description: GDS launched the digital HM Armed Forces Veteran Card as a credential in the GOV.UK One Login app (GOV.UK Wallet roadmap milestone).

title: Digital driving licence tested (limited trial) in GOV.UK One Login app
description: GDS began testing digital driving licences through a limited/private trial with DVLA colleagues (wallet development milestone).

title: UIDAI created as attached office
description: UIDAI functioned as attached office of Planning Commission via Gazette notification dated 28 Jan 2009.

title: First Aadhaar number issued (national launch)
description: First Aadhaar number issued on 29 Sep 2010 at national launch of Aadhaar project

title: Aadhaar e-KYC service announced
description: Press Information Bureau described UIDAI e-KYC service enabling paperless KYC for financial and other services.

title: DigiLocker beta rolled out
description: Beta version of Digital Locker System released on 10 Feb 2015 under Digital India.

title: DigiLocker launched
description: DigiLocker launched on 1 July 2015 under the Digital India programme.

title: eSign online electronic signature service started
description: Controller of Certifying Authorities noted eSign online electronic service started in July 2015.

title: Aadhaar Act enacted
description: Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery...) Act, 2016 enacted on 25 March 2016.

title: Aadhaar (Authentication) Regulations notified
description: Aadhaar (Authentication) Regulations, 2016 came into force on publication in Official Gazette.

title: Aadhaar (Data Security) Regulations notified
description: Aadhaar Data Security Regulations, 2016 published in Gazette and came into force upon publication.

title: Virtual ID and Limited KYC introduced
description: UIDAI circular introduced Virtual ID, UID token and limited KYC to enhance privacy.

title: Virtual ID acceptance mandated for agencies
description: UIDAI circular indicated agencies must migrate to accept Virtual ID and limited KYC by June 2018.

title: Supreme Court Aadhaar judgment delivered
description: Supreme Court delivered judgment on Aadhaar constitutionality on 26 Sep 2018.

title: Digital Personal Data Protection Act assented
description: DPDP Act, 2023 received presidential assent on 11 Aug 2023.

title: Draft DPDP Rules 2025 published for consultation
description: MeitY invited comments on draft Digital Personal Data Protection Rules, 2025 from 3 Jan 2025.

title: DPDP Act provisions commence (phase 1)
description: Certain provisions of DPDP Act commenced on 13 Nov 2025 per commencement notifications.

title: 住基ネット（住民基本台帳ネットワーク）の一次稼働開始
description: 2002年8月5日、住民票コードの通知開始等を含む住基ネットの一次稼働が開始。

title: 住基ネット最高裁判決（合憲判断）
description: 2008年3月6日、住基ネットによる本人確認情報の管理・利用等が憲法13条の保障するプライバシー権を侵害しない旨の最高裁判断が示された。

title: マイナンバー法（番号法）の公布
description: 「行政手続における特定の個人を識別するための番号の利用等に関する法律（平成25年法律第27号）」が公布。

title: マイナンバーの付番・通知開始
description: 2015年10月5日時点で住民票に記載されている住民にマイナンバーが指定され、市区町村から通知カードで郵送通知が開始。

title: マイナンバー制度の導入（利用開始）
description: 2016年1月1日からマイナンバー制度が導入され、税・社会保障等の手続で利用が開始。

title: マイナポータルの提供開始（本格運用）
description: マイナンバー制度に連動する個人向けポータルサイト「マイナポータル」が2017年11月から提供開始（情報連携の本格運用等と併せて開始）。

title: 通知カードの廃止
description: マイナンバーを通知する「通知カード」は2020年5月25日に廃止され、新規発行・再交付・記載事項変更ができなくなった。

title: マイナンバーカードの健康保険証利用（マイナ保険証）
description: マイナンバーカードを健康保険証として利用する仕組み（マイナ保険証）。利用可能な医療機関・薬局は対応状況により異なる。

title: マイナポータルで薬剤情報・特定健診情報等の閲覧機能を追加
description: マイナポータルで薬剤情報、特定健診情報、後期高齢者健診情報等を確認・取得できる機能が追加（令和3年10月リリース）。

title: マイナ免許証の運用開始
description: マイナンバーカードのICチップに運転免許情報を記録し、マイナンバーカードを運転免許証として利用できる「マイナ免許証」の運用が開始。

title: スマートフォンのマイナンバーカード（機能の拡充）
description: マイナンバーカードの機能をスマートフォン（iPhone、Android端末）に追加して利用できる「スマートフォンのマイナンバーカード」を案内（使える場所やサービスは順次拡大）。

title: Mobile driver license verification
description: PASS app enabled driver license verification via smartphone

title: Mobile driver’s license verification via PASS
description: Korean National Police Agency and carriers launched PASS verification for driver’s license (smartphone ID)

title: Mobile driver’s license pilot launched
description: MOIS and National Police launched six-month pilot issuance of mobile driver’s licenses on Jan 27, 2022.

title: EU adequacy decision for Republic of Korea
description: EU implementing decision recognising adequacy of PIPA for transfers from EU

title: Mobile driver’s license nationwide rollout
description: Mobile driver’s licenses introduced nationwide starting July 28, 2022 following pilot.

title: Road Traffic Act amended for mobile driver’s licenses
description: Road Traffic Act amended (Act No.20155) to provide legal basis for mobile driver’s licenses.

title: Mobile driver’s license legal basis becomes effective
description: Amendment providing legal basis for mobile driver’s licenses effective Oct 25, 2024.

title: Mobile Resident Registration Card pilot begins
description: Pilot issuance for mobile resident registration cards began on Dec 27, 2024

title: Nationwide Mobile Resident Registration Card announced
description: Government announced mobile resident registration card available nationwide with rollout starting Mar 28, 2025

title: Mobile Resident Registration Card nationwide
description: Mobile resident registration card available nationwide

title: Budget funding boost for iGovt/RealMe announced
description: Beehive release announced funding boost and noted RealMe would launch soon based on iGovt services.

title: RealMe verified rollout begins
description: DIA announced rollout of RealMe verified accounts starting 2 July 2013

title: RealMe login and verified identity launched
description: DIA launched RealMe login and RealMe verified identity in 2013 as digital identity services

title: RealMe Now mobile onboarding app launched
description: DIA launched RealMe Now mobile app enabling remote identity verification via selfie and passport photo match.

title: Identity Check pilot with Hospitality NZ announced
description: DIA partnered with Hospitality NZ to pilot Identity Check online identity verification service.

title: Nationwide Identity Check pilot reported
description: Media reported nationwide pilot testing of Identity Check service.

title: Digital Identity Services Trust Framework Act assented
description: Digital Identity Services Trust Framework Act 2023 received assent on 5 April 2023

title: Identity Check reusable component added to gov roadmap
description: DIA notes Identity Check added to All-of-Government Service Modernisation Roadmap in 2024.

title: Trust Framework Act fully in force by July 2024
description: Act provides that to extent not earlier, it comes into force on 1 July 2024

title: Identity Check roadmap indicates broader rollout
description: DIA roadmap indicates 2026 broader rollout following pilots.

title: SingPass launched
description: SingPass was launched on 1 March 2003 as common login for government e-services

title: SingPass security enhancements announced
description: GovTech described ongoing security enhancements and plans for 2FA for sensitive e-gov transactions

title: MyInfo launched
description: MyInfo pilot ran Jan–Apr 2016 and service launched May 2016 for e-services to auto-fill forms

title: SingPass mobile app launched
description: SingPass Mobile app launched in October 2018 to provide convenient access and authentication

title: Singpass app launched
description: Singpass app introduced in October 2018 as mobile interface for authentication and services.

title: Singpass Digital IC feature introduced
description: Digital IC feature was introduced in Singpass app in May 2020 for in-person ID.

title: Singpass refreshed brand and logo updated
description: GovTech announced refreshed Singpass brand identity and updated logo from 7 March 2021.

title: All government agencies accept Digital IC
description: All government agencies began accepting Singpass Digital IC for in-person services from 1 Nov 2021.

title: Singpass national digital identity factsheet published
description: MDDI published factsheet describing Singpass features including Myinfo and Verify.

title: Singapore Digital Driving Licence launched in Singpass
description: Singapore Police Force and partners launched the Singapore Digital Driving Licence in the Singpass app on 7 March 2022.

title: GovTech updates Singpass product page stats
description: GovTech updated Singpass product page describing scale and transactions (last updated Nov 2025).

title: Finansiell ID-Teknik established
description: Finansiell ID-Teknik (BankID operator) established in September 2002.

title: First BankID e-ID issued
description: BankID consortium issued the first BankID e-ID in 2003

title: BankID infrastructure expanded to more issuers
description: BankID infrastructure expanded as additional banks began issuing BankID in 2004.

title: BankID reaches 500,000 users
description: During 2005 tax declaration period, BankID reached 500,000 users.

title: BankID use expands to private companies
description: By 2006, more private companies and public bodies used BankID, surpassing 2 million uses per month.

title: Mobile BankID launched
description: BankID launched Mobile BankID electronic identification for mobile phones in April 2010.

title: Swedish eIdentification Board established
description: Swedish eIdentification Board was created in 2011 to coordinate eID infrastructure

title: Swish mobile payments launched
description: Swish mobile payment service launched by major banks enabling instant payments using Mobile BankID.

title: Swish app available to public
description: Swish app became available for download from 12 Dec 2012.

title: Freja eID launched
description: Verisec launched the new e-ID Freja eID on 15 Aug 2017; students were the first user group.

title: Freja eID+ joins national eID market
description: EU blog noted Freja eID+ joined Swedish eID means in August 2018.

title: Swedish eID scheme pre-notified under eIDAS
description: Sweden pre-notified its national eID scheme (Svensk e-legitimation) in December 2020.

title: EU blog announces Sweden eID pre-notification
description: European Commission blog published overview of Sweden pre-notification and eID means.

title: BankID digital ID card feature ready to activate
description: BankID announced its digital ID card is ready to activate in the BankID app (requires Swedish passport or national ID card).

title: BankID notified for EU cross-border use
description: BankID published in EU official journal enabling use in EU public e-services.

title: REAL ID Act signed into law
description: REAL ID Act of 2005 was signed into law on May 11, 2005

title: Login.gov launched
description: Login.gov was deployed in April 2017 as a common sign-in platform for federal websites

title: Login.gov identity verification launched
description: Login.gov launched identity verification in Fall 2018 as a key milestone.

title: Login.gov reaches one million proofed accounts
description: Login.gov reached one million proofed accounts in August 2022.

title: All Cabinet agencies using Login.gov
description: GSA announced all Cabinet agencies are using Login.gov as of Sep 29, 2023

title: Login.gov launches NIST IAL2-compliant offering
description: Login.gov launched a NIST IAL2-compliant offering in September 2024.

title: TSA mDL waiver rule effective
description: TSA final rule enabling continued mDL acceptance becomes effective Nov 25, 2024

title: REAL ID enforcement begins
description: Full REAL ID enforcement begins May 7, 2025 for federal official purposes including TSA

title: Login.gov adds passport-based identity verification
description: GSA announced Login.gov allowing identity verification using a US passport on Aug 20, 2025.

title: Login.gov program update on passport-based verification
description: Login.gov partners update announced passport-based identity verification rollout.
